title: Mike Eisenberg Memorial Fund
description: The fund will be used to memorialize Mike Eisenberg through either a hands-on museum piece to be installed in the Engineering Center and/or to create a scholarship for undergrad CS students who share Mike's sense of intellectual play and wonder.
marketingContent: The fund will be used to memorialize Mike Eisenberg through either a hands-on museum piece to be installed in the Engineering Center and/or to create a scholarship for undergrad CS students in Playful Computation.
